article.title: Lockheed Martin to Support Airborne Mine Countermeasures
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems & Training, Owego, N.Y., is being awarded $7,037,522 for firm-fixed-price delivery order #4090 against a previously issued basic ordering agreement (N00019-09-G-0005) for ten organic airborne mine countermeasures technical insertion common console kits in support of the MH-60S program. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
